definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: We definitely appreciate the direction that the NYT is taking.
sentences.chinese: 我们绝对赞赏纽约时报的这一发展方向。

sentences.english: It was one of the best-sellers on the list of the New York Times.
sentences.chinese: 这本书被纽约时报列为最畅销书之一。

sentences.english: The news sent investors scurrying in after-hours trading, according to the New York Times
sentences.chinese: 据纽约时报报道，消息发布在投资者收市后。

sentences.english: And the New York Times said that Dewey would win the election by a large majority.
sentences.chinese: 纽约时报也认为杜为将会以绝对优势赢得选举。

sentences.english: Here the New York Times curates its readers' debate.
sentences.chinese: 该栏目中纽约时报为读者的争论充当牧师角色。

sentences.english: In his Times piece, Buffett felt free to speak for his fellow rich.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约时报上，巴菲特毫不拘束地代表富人们讲话。

sentences.english: Bittman took a circuitous path to his job at the Times.
sentences.chinese: 比特曼采取了迂回的路径，他的工作在“纽约时报”。

sentences.english: Staff of the Beijing bureau of The New York Times contributed research.
sentences.chinese: 纽约时报北京局的员工贡献资料。

sentences.english: New York Times critic Alessandra Stanley wasn't quite so positive, however.
sentences.chinese: 纽约时报评论家，爱莉姗卓史坦利却没有那么正面。

sentences.english: For Skimmer the New York Times has a client. It is Blackberry.
sentences.chinese: 《纽约时报》浏览窗就有一个广告客户，那就是黑莓。

sentences.english: The New York Times ran Steve Jobs' sister's eulogy this morning.
sentences.chinese: 纽约时报今天早上刊发了乔布斯妹妹的悼词。

sentences.english: Can the New York Times sell CPC advertising?
sentences.chinese: 《纽约时报》可以采用这种CPC模式吗？

sentences.english: I have the "New York Times", and fourteen dimes.
sentences.chinese: 我有份纽约时报，同十四角钱。

sentences.english: My personal preference is two Zegna bars and a copy of the Times.
sentences.chinese: 我个人比较喜欢两个杰尼亚领扣，和一份纽约时报。

sentences.english: The New York Times has a story about it in today's business section.
sentences.chinese: 纽约时报在今天的商业版上有一个关于该法案的故事。

sentences.english: That's what he told a reporter from The New York Times.
sentences.chinese: 该消息曾在其接受《纽约时报》的记者采访时爆料过。

definition: The New Yorker, US magazine/resident of New York
New York Times, abbr. for 紐約時報|纽约时报[Niu3 Yue1 Shi2 bao4]
Newsweek magazine/also written 新聞周刊|新闻周刊

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1
Mei3 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1
Mei3 guo2 Quan2 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1
